page.title: 02PROPERTY
page.content: All properties are built of natural stone & many have been built 150yrs. or longer, majority are renovated from previous houses, others are converted from disused buildings/barns. All have basic amenities majority have central heating, oil or solid fuel,town gas is 8 miles away. Majority retain old features, mullion windows, beamed ceilings & stone stairs.Each residence is known by name,there are no street names & majority are owner occupied or owner used as 2nd. homes. Properties in the Dales are very attractive to house buyers Glenside_ Horsehouse 3 bed.Cottage Â£37,500. Listed Buildings, classified for their special architechure or historic interest recorded by the Dept. of Enviroment,600 are found in the Dales. Within the survey_ Thwaite Arms, Deer Close, Hindlewaite Hall, Hall Farm.
